summary: A configuration container that defines all architectural and training hyperparameters for a SpeechT5 model, including encoder/decoder dimensions, attention heads, feed‑forward sizes, dropout rates, convolutional front‑end settings, SpecAugment options, positional embeddings, guided attention loss parameters, and caching behavior.
business_intent: Allow developers to easily customize and instantiate SpeechT5 models for speech‑to‑text, text‑to‑speech, or multimodal tasks by providing a single source of truth for model specifications, ensuring reproducibility and simplifying model deployment.
